title: How to Replace a Craftsman Hassle Free Trim Line

steps.headline: Turn your weed whacker over and take a look at it.
steps.description: If you look at the 'center' at the round piece.

steps.headline: Pull straight out on the round piece.
steps.description: You don't need to twist it or anything, just pull it out.

steps.headline: Pull out the old trim line and take your replacement line and put it into the same holes that you had removed it from.
Replace the round piece.
steps.description: It will take some elbow grease. One suggestion is to 'bounce' it on the sidewalk to get it to back in.

text: Turn your weed whacker over and take a look at it. If you look at the 'center' at the round piece. Pull straight out on the round piece. You don't need to twist it or anything, just pull it out. Pull out the old trim line and take your replacement line and put it into the same holes that you had removed it from.  Replace the round piece. It will take some elbow grease. One suggestion is to 'bounce' it on the sidewalk to get it to back in.
